content.query:
USE perthstdotcom
GO

CREATE VIEW [dbo].[publicHolidays_ALL]
AS
SELECT
     *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://perthstdotcom.dfs.core.windows.net/edh/workspace/allholidays.parquet/part-00000-d06a4212-81aa-4b57-b3b0-4a6245608cde-c000.snappy.parquet',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]
GO
